name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meters to Yards for Google Maps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Google Maps meters to yards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Google Maps "Measure distance" tool is great, and this extension makes it even better. Made especially for golfers that don't rely on meters, you'll now be able to see distances in yards. 

Steps to use:
1. Navigate to Google Maps
2. Right click on the map and select "Measure distance" 
3. Click another spot on the map. You'll now see a box at the bottom of the screen listing the distance in Feet and Meters 
4. Hover your mouse on that box to see the calculation into Yards
5. Check this video for a walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DhtIXmykSs

If you're still having problems with the extension, please email me at adsbxaddon@gmail.com.
